com.jidesoft.docking
Interface DockableHolder

All Known Subinterfaces:
DockableBarDockableHolder
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultAppletDockableBarDockableHolder, DefaultAppletDockableHolder, DefaultDialogDockableHolder, DefaultDockableBarDockableHolder, DefaultDockableHolder, DefaultWindowDockableHolder, Workspace
public interface DockableHolder

DockableHolder inteface is used to indicate the container can hold Dockable.
You can make JFrame a DockableHolder simply by implementing this interface.

See Also:
Dockable

Method Summary
 DockingManager getDockingManager()
          Return the DockingManager that manages the DockableHolder.
 

Method Detail

getDockingManager

public DockingManager getDockingManager()
Return the DockingManager that manages the DockableHolder. There is only one Dockingmanager allowed in each DockableHolder.

Returns:
the DockingManager that manages the DockableHolder.
